column1: Table #:19.  Number of sentenced inmates admitted to State prison,
by type of admission and offense, 1990, 1995, and 1998
Table 19.  Number of sentenced inmates admitted to State prison,
by type of admission and offense, 1990, 1995, and 1998
Note:  Based on the total number admissions by
type (from NPS1-A) and multiplied by the proportion
of admissions by most serious offenses (from NCRP)
and then rounded to the nearest 100.
